Content: ー Exiege ーNLNLWe are a fast growing Clan that has a Team per Region. We Hope To Have Fun_ Grow_ Improve_ And Succeed Together. The recruiter will judge your skills based on how you build _ aim _ and communicate with your team-mates.NLIf we believe that you're good but don't have the required KDR to get a certain role _ an exception can be made.NLNLNoteNLIf you're not suitable for casuals _ you'll be kicked but able to do another tryout at another time.NLNLDM ME IF YOU WANT TO JOIN!
